property.name: reader.instance
property.description: Required. Name or URL of the ServiceNow instance from which data records will be retrieved. You can specify an instance name (_e.g._ `dev12345`) or a URL (_e.g._ `https://dev12345.service-now.com`)

property.name: reader.username
property.description: Required.

property.name: reader.password
property.description: Required.

property.name: reader.pagesize
property.description: Number of records to be processed at a time if not overridden at the table level. Default is 200.

property.name: reader.verify_session
property.description: Causes the loader, at startup, to verify that it can connect to ServiceNow by reading the **sys_user** record of the connecting user. Default is **true**.

property.name: reader.verify_timezone
property.description: Causes an exception will be thrown if the ServiceNow user time zone is not "GMT". Default is **false**.

property.name: app.agent
property.description: Required if using the **DataPump** app.

property.name: app.scope
property.description: Optional. Default is `x_108443_sndml`.

property.name: app.instance
property.description: Required if using the **DataPump** app. Name or URL of the instance where the app is installed.

property.name: app.username
property.description: Required if `app.instance` is specified.

property.name: app.password
property.description: Required if `app.instance` is specified.

property.name: dict.instance
property.description: Name or URL of the instance from which dictionary information will be obtained. This is optional and the default is to use `reader.instance`. This property is not applicable if using the DataPump app (_i.e._ if `app.instance` is specified.)

property.name: dict.username
property.description: Required if `dict.instance` is specified.

property.name: dict.password
property.description: Required if `dict.instance` is specified.

property.name: database.url
property.description: Required. JDBC URL for the target database. Refer to the documentation for your selected JDBC driver.

property.name: database.username
property.description: Required unless database is SQLite. User name for the target database.

property.name: database.password
property.description: Required unless database is SQLite.

property.name: database.dialect
property.description: Specifies a section in the templates file. If not specified, the loader will infer the correct section using the <drivers> element of the template and the JDBC prefix of the datamart URL.

property.name: database.schema
property.description: Recommended. See notes above.

property.name: database.templates
property.description: The name of an XML file to use for generating SQL statements. If not specified, the loader will use `sqltemplates.xml` which is embedded in the JAR. For information refer to [[Templates]].

property.name: database.timezone
property.description: This is normally **not** specified. If omitted then "GMT" will be used. If set to "default" then the time zone of the Java VM will be used.

property.name: loader.metrics_folder
property.description: The name of a directory where metrics files are located. If not specified, metrics files are assumed to reside in the current working directory. For information refer to [[Metrics]].

property.name: loader.warn_on_truncate
property.description: Causes a warning will be written to the log whenever a field is truncated when written to the database.

property.name: daemon.interval
property.description: Required if using `--daemon`

property.name: server.port
property.description: Required if using `--server`
